review_blob: poured from a 12.oz bottle a nice cloudy golden color with a nice puffy white head to it. smell very sweet citrus maybe a little banana. taste is very good a little bitter at first than i mellows out to a very mild lemon/ orange taste finished very clean. love this beer planned on only one for the night but couldnt resist a second

dark almost reddish pour head was short lived but puffy at first. smells sweet like cinnimon. taste is good not a whole going on though same taste the whole way through definetely at favorite of mine great at christmas time

beer_brewer_name: Magic Hat Brewing Company (North American Breweries)
review_blob: my first beer im rating has a nice amber color not much of a head but lingered for most of the beer though.  tasted  very hoppy and bitter throughout the mouth with a noticable after taste not a big IPA guy but this is ver y drinkible has a definate citrus smell to it not my favorite im sure ill have more in the future though.
